oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Performance - Kenny and Amanda Smith - 2015-11-07.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Performance by Kenny and Amanda Smith as part of the Bluegrass and Beyond program from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on November 7, 2015. First performer of four. Presented by the Crump family and Cotton Music. Honoring George A. and Marjorie S. Crump.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Kenny and Amanda Smith (Musical group)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Introduced by Jim Hurst. Accompanied by Alan Bibey. Performances include; Winter's Come And Gone -- Song For Emily -- Catch Me If I Try -- John Henry Blues -- Jesus, King Of Heaven -- Cumberland Gap -- Randall Collins -- The Birmingham Turnaround -- Unidentified Instrumental -- Run Away, Boys -- Coming Around Again -- Studebaker.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Smith, Kenny; Smith, Amanda; Country Music Hall of Fame & Museum (Nashville, Tenn.);
